phrs.translation: 的优先次序, 正在翻译

sentences.sentence: He was member of the AD hoc High Level Expert Group of the European Commission on the Prioritisation Procedure for New Research Infrastructure in the 7th framework program.
sentences.translation: 他曾是第七项结构计划中的新研究基础设施优先化程序的欧洲委员会特设高级专家组成员。

sentences.sentence: they are useful for short term prioritisation and planning, but when you need to understand what your system does six months after implementing a story, the card isn't going to help much.
sentences.translation: 在做短期的优先级排列和计划时它们非常有用。 但是当一个故事完成六个月后，如果你需要了解系统时，这些卡片却不会有太大的帮助。
